ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]light Cabbagium plating
ItemType.description: Cabbagium plating utilizes proprietary alloys known only to Cabbage Corp. Its strength slowly fades as its elements decay into baser forms, though it slowly regenerates while exposed to sunlight.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]Cabbagium armor
ItemType.description: Cabbagium armor utilizes proprietary alloys known only to Cabbage Corp. Its strength fades as its elements decay into baser forms, though it slowly regenerates while exposed to sunlight.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]2x-layered Cabbagium armor
ItemType.description: Cabbagium armor utilizes proprietary alloys known only to Cabbage Corp. Its strength fades as its elements decay into baser forms, though it slowly regenerates while exposed to sunlight. Heavier armor segments decay more rapidly.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]hardened Cabbagium plating
ItemType.description: This plating is contructed via a proprietary process that binds a proto-cabbagium catalyst to a plasteel substrate. Its strength slowly fades as its elements decay into baser forms, though it regenerates while exposed to sunlight.
